ST28-001.name: Ashura Doji ST28-001
ST28-001.effect: [On Play] If your Leader has the {Land of Wano} type and your opponent has 3 or more Life cards, K.O. up to 1 of your opponent's Characters with a base cost of 5 or less.

ST28-002.name: Izo ST28-002
ST28-002.effect: [DON!! x2] This Character gains [Blocker]. [On Play] Your {Land of Wano} type Leader gains [Banish] during this turn.

ST28-003.name: Kin'emon ST28-003
ST28-003.effect: [Trigger] If your Leader has the {Land of Wano} type and your opponent has 3 or less Life cards, play this card.

ST28-004.name: Kouzuki Momonosuke ST28-004
ST28-004.effect: [Your Turn] If you have 2 or less Life cards, your Leader gains +1000 power. [Activate: Main] [Once Per Turn] You may return 2 total of your currently given DON!! cards to your cost area rested: This Character gains [Rush] and +1000 power during this turn.

ST28-005.name: Yamato ST28-005
ST28-005.effect: [DON!! x2] [Your Turn] This Character gains +3000 power. [On Play] Look at 5 cards from the top of your deck; reveal up to 1 {Land of Wano} type card with a cost of 2 or more and add it to your hand. Then, place the rest at the bottom of your deck in any order.
